trans-unit.source: Specifies the case of characters in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項中字元的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的值中使用這個列舉型別的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that is used to accept a password.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>用來接受密碼的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change all characters typed to uppercase and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to restrict the password length to eight characters.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>以大寫輸入變更的所有字元的屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>屬性，以將密碼長度限制為 8 個字元。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property to center the password in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>屬性中心中的密碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。
將所有的字元轉換成小寫。

trans-unit.source: The case of characters is left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 字元的大小寫不會變更。
將所有的字元轉換成大寫。
